reviews.text: This station has got ticket machines and seating but not much else including toilets. King Street is a short walk if you want food or something.
It's a simple railway station, enough said. However, don't always expect to be able to use the ticket machines as they seem to be out of order more times than actually working.
Great train station, just needs a few more services.
Nice station, easy to use! Clean!

Belper station has hourly trains to Derby, Nottingham and Matlock. There's even a morning one to Chesterfield and Sheffield and an evening departure for Leicester and London. Good facilities including ticket machines, somewhere to shelter from the rain, a departure board and announcements. Just could do with some more services to London, the South West and the North!
